   contain the root `toctree` directive.


Welcome to IDMatch's documentation!
*****************************************

.. image:: /images/Screenshot.png
   :align:   center



Image and DSM Matching (IDMatch) is a software that derives surface velocities from an image or a digital surface model (DSM) pair.

This website gives you the following main information:

The :ref:`label-introduction` section gives you the overview and the purpose of the software and present the results obtained from a case study. The section :ref:`label-usage` is more practical
and explains detailed steps for the software installation as well as how to use it. The software's documentation (:ref:`label-docs`) presents the workflow within the software as well as details about each function


Please navigate through the Table of Content to get access to the different sections.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :hidden:

   Introduction <introduction>
   Using IDMatch <using_idmatch>
   Documentation <documentation>
   Contribution <contribution>
   License and Citation <license_citation>
   Search <searchf>
